name: Echo
description: Echo is an evolutionary robot programmed with rapidly adapting artificial intelligence and flight capability, versatile enough to fill multiple battlefield combat roles.

abilities.name: Tri-Shot
abilities.description: Fires 3 shots at once, in a triangle pattern.

abilities.name: Sticky Bombs
abilities.description: Fire a volley of sticky bombs that detonate after a delay.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Fly forward quickly and then free-fly briefly.

abilities.name: Focusing Beam
abilities.description: Channel a beam for a few seconds. Deals very high damage to targets under half health.

abilities.name: Duplicate
abilities.description: Become a copy of the targeted enemy hero. They cannot swap heroes for the duration.

abilities.name: Glide
abilities.description: Hold jump to glide while falling.

story: Developed by Overwatch roboticist Mina Liao, the highly adaptable, advanced AI-driven robot Echo derives her personality from her creator. But after Liao was killed, her project was shut down and Echo placed in military quarantine. Years later, she was freed by Cole Cassidy and joined the new Overwatch in the fight to save the world.
